casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
James Bernard BENNETT No. 169P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Linda B. Weisel, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Bennett, James Bernard. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, Elizabeth L. McKay, Special Deputy Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 4th of June 2018 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
